description: React component for displaying a list of tasks with functionality for selection and marking tasks as complete, including rendering task details like title, priority, due date, and ETA.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks = [], onSelect, onToggleComplete, selectedId = null })

methods.name: fmtDate(d)
methods.description: Utility function to format date strings into locale-aware date representations.
